title: AI-Augmented CI/CD Pipelines: From Code Commit to Production with Autonomous Decisions
summary: Modern software delivery has accelerated from quarterly releases to multiple deployments per day. While CI/CD tooling has matured, human decision points interpreting flaky tests, choosing rollback strategies, tuning feature flags, and deciding when to promote a canary remain major sources of latency and operational toil.
